meaningMnemonic: The <radical>narwhal</radical> and the <radical>turkey</radical> are meeting in <radical>private</radical> to uh, show each other some private things. Doing this they realize they're both <kanji>male</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: These <kanji>male</kanji> animals are obviously experimenting with things still. Ah, they must be <reading>you</reading>ths (ゆう)!  To be a youth, again!
